name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
short_description: Timeless style in this classic cotton t-shirt.
description: Elevate your casual look with this Classic Cotton T-Shirt. The timeless design and high-quality cotton make it perfect for any occasion. Whether for a day out with friends or a relaxed evening, this t-shirt offers both style and comfort. Available in various colors to match your look.
headline: Timeless Elegance
subtitle: Perfect for casual occasions and relaxed evenings.

name: Sporty Performance T-Shirt
short_description: Elevate your workout with this comfortable performance t-shirt.
description: Upgrade your athletic style with this Sporty Performance T-Shirt. The moisture-wicking fabric and comfortable fit provide support during workouts or sports activities. Whether for a run or a game of basketball, this t-shirt is a versatile addition to your collection.
headline: Elevate Your Workouts
subtitle: Moisture-wicking fabric for comfort during exercise.
